caller_intent: The caller, Ed Weiss from B T S Tire and Wheel, seeks assistance in obtaining a certificate of insurance for Leroy Trent's business (Firewater Service Center) to add the Goodyear program. He mentions having sent documents to Goodyear and needing the certificate.
resolution_steps: Agent asks for the policy number, which the caller does not have but provides the business address (1329 Scenic Drive, Stuart, Virginia) and business name (Firewater Transport, LLC/Firewater Service Center).
Agent confirms details and offers to connect the caller with Gloria, a commercial agent, to handle the certificate request.
knowledge_required: Understanding certificate of insurance requests for commercial clients
Internal process for transferring calls to commercial agents
summary: Ed Weiss from B T S Tire and Wheel requested help obtaining a certificate of insurance for Firewater Service Center to add the Goodyear program. The agent collected business details and transferred the call to a commercial agent (Gloria) for resolution.
